name: undiscoverable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
impossible to discover: For some undiscoverable cause or reason, they have permitted foreign vessels to bring duty free merchandise into our ports. The answers often hinge on minute facts undiscoverable without extensive investigation.
More examplesFewer examplesGod is hidden and undiscoverable by mind alone.Advanced computer modeling now allows engineers to discern previously undiscoverable oil and gas deposits.The true severity of his mental condition was undiscoverable when he pleaded guilty.Undetectable and undiscoverable effects might be detectable and discoverable in principle.
